content:
What the title says. Hello everyone! I'm back. I've finally received full approval from uni and will start working on my thesis around mir-opts.

I will start with completing const-prop to make it control-flow aware (so that more things can safely be const-prop'd) and then maybe go for Value Range Analysis (which is so far non-existent but I think I can start it maybe?) and we'll see from there.
I'll be working with @oli on these things.
That's all! :heart:️
@Félix Fischer That sounds awesome!
